<script>(function(){
'use strict';
var stats = window.ttiStats = {};
var addListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('addEventListener' in document) {
document.addEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.attachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var removeListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('removeEventListener' in document) {
document.removeEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.detachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var baseTimeStamp = (new Date()).getTime();
var onClick = function onClick() {
stats.click = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('click', onClick);
};
var onScroll = function onScroll() {
stats.scroll = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('scroll', onScroll);
};
addListener('click', onClick);
addListener('scroll', onScroll);
}());
</script>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

More accommodations in San Francisco: Hotels Apartments Hostels Motels Villas Inns Vacation Homes Homestays B&Bs HI San Francisco Downtown Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 8 . 3 Very Good 1,845 reviews In San Francisco just a 5-minute walk from shopping and dining in Union Square, this hostel features a theater room. Each bright room is practically furnished and includes a continental breakfast. Orange Village Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 7 . 3 Good 2,364 reviews In downtown San Francisco, Orange Village Hostel is just a 5-minute walk from Union Square Park. A full kitchen and free Wi-Fi access are featured at this hostel. USA Hostels San Francisco San Francisco, United States of America 8 . 4 Very Good 2,342 reviews Featuring a daily free breakfast and free Wi-Fi, USA Hostels San Francisco is just a 5-minute walk to cable cars and Union Square. San Francisco’s Chinatown is just a 10-minute walk away. HI San Francisco City Center Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 7 . 8 Good 1,577 reviews Located less than 1 mile from Union Square shops and bars, this hostel features 3 lounge areas, a cafe and bar. All shared or private rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Minna Hotel San Francisco, United States of America 6 . 6 Review score 1,335 reviews Centrally located in the SoMa District of San Francisco, this hostel is 1 block from the Moscone Center and Warfield Theater. It features 24-hour front desk service and free Wi-Fi. Europa Hotel & Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 5 . 7 Review score 1,317 reviews Europa Hotel & Hostel is located in San Francisco, 0.7 miles from Union Square and 0.7 miles from Xanadu Gallery. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Amsterdam Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 6 . 9 Review score 1,688 reviews Amsterdam Hostel is located in the Union Square neighborhood in San Francisco, 547 yards from Union Square and 328 yards from Geary Theater. The rooms are equipped with a TV. HI San Francisco Fisherman's Wharf Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 8 . 2 Very Good 2,076 reviews Overlooking San Francisco Bay, this Fisherman’s Wharf hostel features a free continental breakfast and free Wi-Fi. A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests and daily activities are provided. Adelaide Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 8 . 0 Very Good 1,815 reviews Serving a daily breakfast with bagels, fruit, coffee, and more, this San Francisco hostel is conveniently located within a 5-minute walk of Union Square. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi. Green Tortoise Hostel San Francisco, United States of America 8 . 4 Very Good 612 reviews In the lively North Beach Little Italy district, this San Francisco hostel is just a 3 minute walk to the renowned City Lights Bookstore and the entertainment district. Free Wi-Fi is provided. All hostels in San Francisco Hotels That Guests Love in San Francisco Amsterdam Hostel “ The room was ok. They give you a towel. Coust x benefit it is the best hostel in San Francisco for sure. Well located served by public transport. ” USA Hostels San Francisco “ This young and modern hostel is a great opportunity in San Francisco. We enjoyed our stay, young guests, nice staff and good atmosphere. The queensize-bed-room was very clean and offered a fridge and microwave, breakfast in the basement is included. The location in the city is good, close to Bart and Cable-Cars starting point. ” Haveli Hotel San Francisco “ Excellent value for San Francisco. Convenient for transport around the city and to the airport. More like a hostel than a hotel but good for the price. Clean and comfortable. ” Adelaide Hostel “ Nice hostel in San Francisco. Closed to everywhere. Breakfast is also good. ” Hotel Carlton, a Joie de Vivre Hotel “ I was very excited to spend the last two days of my trip in this hotel but it sadly did not live up to expectations - considering how much I paid it felt more like a youth hostel. Only positive thing I can say was that the second night I finally slept better than the terrible experience the night before. ” You might also like these property types: Spa Hotels Romantic Hotels Family Hotels Boutique Hotels Budget Hotels Marriott Hotels Holiday Inn Hotels Sheraton Hotels Hilton Hotels Five-star Hotels Four-star Hotels Three-star Hotels Hotels with Pools Hotels with Parking Hotels with jacuzzis Pet-friendly Hotels Hotels with WiFi Flats Places to Stay Rooms Lodgings Accommodations Luxury Hotels Search Hotels Check-in Date + / / Check-in Date Check-out Date + / / Check-out Date Are you traveling for work? We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from real, verified guests. How does it work? 1 It starts with a booking The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property. 2 Followed by a trip When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more. 3 And finally, a review After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site. If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.
